Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media were buzzing with excitement about various things from the incredible recycling efforts of ReplasProducts to an upcoming virtual event hosted by FSU Australia aimed at addressing the cost of living crisis. Concerns were also raised about Australia's economic state and opposition to Albanese's immigration plan. The Labor party got a thumbs-up for increasing the minimum wage and pay for aged care workers. There were also positive changes to the social security guide to help people experiencing family and domestic violence and union members who work in aged care secured a wage increase and recognition for their efforts.
